name: Ironroot Chestplate
description: A basic chestplate made from dense ironwood bark.

name: Girdle of the Sand Strider
description: Simple leather belt favored by desert nomads.

name: Obsidian Chainbelt
description: Heavy, but unbreakable under pressure.

name: Amulet of Silent Accord
description: Allows mental communication between allies.

name: Potion of Whispering Smoke
description: Used to create a temporary cloud of concealment.

name: Ashen Claws
description: Gloves left behind in volcanic ash.

name: Steelhorn Helm
description: Decorated with bull horns, favored by warriors.

name: Wanderer's Boots
description: Reliable footwear for long journeys.

name: Ring of Binding Vows
description: Traditionally worn during magical pacts.

name: Defender's Crest
description: A basic but sturdy round shield.

name: Gauntlets of the Forgehand
description: Trusted by blacksmiths and brawlers alike.

name: Necklace of Serpent's Gaze
description: Grants resistance to poison.

name: Ironclasp Belt
description: Standard issue for city guards.

name: Helm of the Forgotten
description: Weathered, but still protective.

name: Chestguard of the Northwatch
description: Designed to withstand freezing winds.

name: Ranger's Trail Boots
description: Perfect for  stalking through underbrush.

name: Belt of the Tunneler
description: Grants improved movement through narrow passages.

name: Flamebound Gauntlets
description: Gloves that radiate heat from ancient fire spirits.

name: Silentstep Boots
description: Enchanted to mute all footsteps of the wearer.

name: Ring of the Moonlit Vale
description: Glows under moonlight, enhancing night vision.

name: Frostbite Blade
description: A sword with a chilling edge that freezes on contact.

name: Breastplate of the Hollow Grove
description: Made from sacred trees and resistant to magic.

name: Boots of the Gale Dancer
description: Move like the wind; light and swift.

name: Necklace of the Twin Suns
description: A symbol of balance between fury and peace.

name: Tower Shield of Valor
description: Its presence inspires courage in allies.

name: Dagger of Night's Breath
description: A blade coated with permanent shadow essence.

name: Potion of Crystal Focus
description: Sharpen the mind and heighten senses.

name: Drakescale Hauberk
description: Armor made from rare drake scales.

name: Dustwalker's Sash
description: Enchanted to reduce sand resistance.

name: Amulet of the Verdant Bloom
description: Grants minor healing when near flora.

name: Potion of Ember Vigor
description: Bursts of energy course through your veins.

name: Wyrmbone Helm
description: Carved from the skull of a young dragon.

name: Ring of Emberglass
description: A magical glass ring warm to the touch.

name: Amulet of the Shifting Tide
description: In tune with moon phases, grants different effects.

name: Kite Shield of the Skyborn
description: Carved with wings and enchanted for agility.

name: Gloves of Crimson Touch
description: Each punch ignites with heat.

name: Necklace of Broken Chains
description: Symbolizes liberation, grants bonus to willpower.

name: Helm of the Forgotten King
description: A helm imbued with the wisdom of a thousand rulers.

name: Necklace of Echoing Whispers
description: Allows the wearer to hear secrets from the shadows.

name: Amulet of the Deep
description: Hums with power from the ocean's deepest trench.

name: Bulwark of the Last Stand
description: Protected a lone warrior during a doomed siege.

name: Crown of Embersteel
description: A regal helm forged in dragonfire.

name: Ring of Stolen Time
description: Grants brief moments of slowed time.

name: Necklace of the Starborn
description: Holds a fragment of a fallen star.

name: Runeblade of the Forgotten Temple
description: Ancient runes glow faintly with power.

name: Chainmail of the Black Sun
description: Absorbs light, rendering the wearer harder to see.

name: Swiftsoul Boots
description: Runes increase travel speed dramatically.

name: Stormcaller's Blade
description: Strikes summon thunderclaps upon contact.

name: Potion of Lunar Dreams
description: Triggers vivid visions or insights.

name: Grasp of the Mountain
description: Infuses wearer with the might of stone.

name: Ring of the Wyrm
description: Linked to an ancient dragon soul.
